overview:
Touch Revolution provides high quality, projected capacitive (P-Cap) multi-touch display solutions to its customers.

Touch Revolution designs and manufactures embedded touch displays, touch sub-systems, and touch monitors in multiple sizes for OEM/ODMs and system integrators to help them quickly add an advanced touch interface to their products. Touch Revolution was founded by industry pioneers with a vision of enabling the proliferation of intelligent connected touch devices.

Touch Revolution offers unparalleled capabilities in integrating embedded multi-touch computers, modules and monitors into products serving industries as varied as healthcare, industrial control and retail. Based on proven P-cap technology, Touch Revolution combines technical expertise with highly experienced engineering and customer service teams to meet the most demanding product needs and schedules.

Touch Revolution’s three innovative product lines include:

NIMble™ Embedded Touch Computers are completely integrated drop-in modules designed for OEMs that want to give customers a high-performance iPhone-like touch experience that includes a touch display, an embedded computer and the Android Application Framework.

Fusion™ Touch Displays are pre-integrated projected capacitive multi-touch display modules that allow OEMS to quickly add an advanced touch experience to products such as entertainment systems, control systems, kiosks, vending machines and POS terminals.

TRū™ Touch Monitors bring an advanced consumer product touch experience to the industrial market looking for a VESA mount or desktop monitor solution. These “plug and play” monitors are Windows 7 certified with a clean, industrial design and durable glass touch surface, making them perfect for product kiosks, ATM’s, gaming machines, retail store self-checkout and interactive displays.

Touch Revolution is headquartered in Silicon Valley, with offices in Holland, Michigan; Taipei, Taiwan; and Mainland China. Touch Revolution is a business unit of TPK USA, LLC, which is part of TPK Holding Co., Ltd. – the largest glass projected capacitive touch screen manufacturer in the world.

www.TouchRev.com for more information.
